molecular.geometry.dot¶

molecular.geometry.dot(a, b, axis=1)[source]¶

Compute vector dot product.

Parameters

  • a (ArrayLike) – Vectors

  • b (ArrayLike) – Vectors

  • axis (int) – Axis to apply sum over.

Returns

Vector dot product

Return type

float or numpy.ndarray
